|cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = v5 (Feroceon) |cpu1spd = 500 |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = STMicro;M29W128FL; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4H561638H-UCB3; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Broadcom;BCM5395; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 3 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 00:1F:F3, 00:19:E3 |oui = 00:1F:F3, 00:19:E3 |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = |exp_if_types = Mini PCI,USB 2.0 |exp_minipci_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.8 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 3.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = |serial = |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = RTC w/ battery, |addchip = Zero-Delay Clock Buffer;Pericom;PI6C2405A;;1;,,, Current Limited Power Distribution Switch;TI;TPS2051B;;1;,,, 1A LDO Regulator;Semtech;SC4211;;1;,,, 3A, 3-6V Synchronous Buck PWM Switcher;TI;TPS54310;;4;,,, 30V Dual N-Channel MOSFET;Vishay;Si4944DY;;1;,,, 12-bit to 24-bit Multiplexed D-Type Latch;TI;ALVCH162260;;1;,,, Hex Buffer/Driver with Open-Drain Outputs;TI;SN74LVC07A;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = abgn |defaulip = |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = Foxconn |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = common |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 08/08/2007 |estreldate = 08/2007 |estprice = 179 |upc = 885909171057 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B000UZCR56 |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Atheros AR5BMB-0072TA |rad1modif = Mini PCI |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR5416; |rad1chip2 = Atheros;AR5133; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Per the Class II permissive change request submitted to the FCC, this model differs from MA073LL/A in that the processor was changed to the 88F5281, the switch was changed to the BCM5397, and the Ethernet CM filter was changed from 824-00339R to 824-M0312R. Manuf. by Foxconn The device uses three antennas. The MIMO configuration is assumed to be 3x3. ==Links of Interest== [http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/30188-apple-airport-extreme-reviewed-dual-band-draft-11n-for-everyone Reviewed on SmallNetBuilder]
